question: Ishan Uday is a:
option1: programme to provide single point light connections to households of rural families below the poverty line
option2: scholarship programme for the students of North Eastern Region
option3: scheme empowering adolescent girls of 11-18 years by improvement of their nutritional and health status
option4: scheme that aims at technology upgradation and skill development through industrial restructuring
answer: scholarship programme for the students of North Eastern Region
explanation:
Second option is the correct answer
The University Grants Commission (UGC), in association with the Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD), has launched the Ishan Uday Scholarship Scheme for promoting higher education in the North Eastern Region.
